title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {tabela: Elaborate Tables Existing on Websites},   author = {Deepak Bastola},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.1},   url = {https://deepbas.github.io/tabela/}, }

title: Elaborate Tables Existing on Websites
text: fast, polite scraper downloadable files & tables

title: Elaborate Tables Existing on Websites
code: # install from CRAN (when published) install.packages("tabela")  # or the development version: remotes::install_github("deepbas/tabela")

title: Elaborate Tables Existing on Websites
code: library(tabela) res <- scrape_page_data(   "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012_Summer_Olympics",   exts = c("csv"),   list_tables = TRUE ) knitr::kable(res$tables[[2]] |> head())

title: Filter links by arbitrary extensions — filter_links_by_ext

what: Scrape and summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables — scrape_page_data
title: Scrape and summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables — scrape_page_data
text: Scrape summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables

title: Scrape and summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables — scrape_page_data
code: scrape_page_data(   root_url,   exts = c("csv", "txt", "xlsx", "sav", "por", "RData"),   page = 1,   page_size = 10,   list_tables = FALSE )

title: Scrape and summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables — scrape_page_data
text: root_url Character. Page scrape. exts Character vector extensions (dot). Defaults include csv, txt, xlsx, sav, por, RData. page Integer. Batch number pagination (1 = first page_size links). page_size Integer. Number file-links per page. Default 10. list_tables Logical. TRUE, also extract HTML tables data.frames.

title: Scrape and summarize downloadable files + (optional) HTML tables — scrape_page_data
text: list elements: $files: tibble file info (name,url,type,rows,cols, ...) $tables (optional): list HTML tables

title: tabela 0.1.1
text: Switch Makevars per-package flags (PKG_CXXFLAGS) avoid warning Reset file timestamps none future Removed non-portable -mno-omit-leaf-frame-pointer flag Ensured DESCRIPTION URL live

title: tabela 0.1.0
text: Initial release: polite sessions, link filtering, file-info, table scraping.
